title: How behavior grows
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Arnold Gesell
brief_description: Documentary on the study of the patterning of prone pregression. This study which took 20 years in 23 phases focuses on the progress of a baby’s movements up to 18 months old.
